page.title: 06Barlestone Community Centre
page.content: There is a youth club on wednesday and thursday.The club is run by Brian Laurenti,Dave Burchell and Tony Yates. The Community centre meets at the school and there are 25 groups such as the old people's luncheon club, Brownies, Cubs, Dancing, Evergreen, Football club, Guides, Ladies Social Group, Popmobility, and Playgroup. The wardens of the Community Centre are Mr. Hartshorn and Mrs. Wood. The Community Centre was started in 1970. The school library has recently been made into a Community Library.
